title: RoboClock Animated Watch Face
summary: RoboClok is a live smart robot for your watch.
developerAddress: Moscow, 107113, Sokolnicheskaya area, 4, building 1-2, room XX-2
description: Animated RoboClock watch face shows time, date, day of week, battery life, number of steps and distance. It reacts to movement and touch.RoboClock tested on: ASUS ZenWatch, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360.
descriptionHTML:
Animated RoboClock watch face shows time, date, day of week, battery life, number of steps and distance. It reacts to movement and touch.

RoboClock tested on: ASUS ZenWatch, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360.
comments: Cute but step counter doesn't work Very cute animations, my 4 month old loves it. But the step counter just keeps going up, doesn't reset each day. Seems a bit of a major flaw for a smart watch face? Don't mind paying for the full version but step counter needs to be fixed first.

Cute but you have to buy game to change face This is a cute idea, makes my watch a little laggy, which is my main complaint. Secondary complaint is that you have to buy a game and play it in order to change the watch faces. Nice idea, maybe I'll check it again later.
I don't understand I purchased some faces 3 days ago and now there missing.  It wants me to purchase it again,  that's not right!
Nice! But the step count just keeps going up?!  Am I missing something?
I can't connect to my smart watch help me.
Does it work on dz09 smart watch?
